page.title: 10RECREATION IN FRINTON
page.content: {FRINTON JUNIOR TENNIS CLUB MEMBER.}THE JUNIOR TENNIS CLUB MEMBERS PLAY TENNIS RIGHT THROUGH THE YEAR, IN THE SUMMER THE MEMBERS CAN PLAY WHENEVER THEY WANT, IF THE WEATHER PERMITS IN THE WINTER THEY CAN PLAY ANYTIME THEN. ONE JUNIOR MEMBER SAYS THAT SHE ENJOYS THE COMPETITION AND THE SWIMMING.SHE WILL PLAY IN ABOUT SIX COMPETITIONS THIS YEAR. SHE RECEIVES COACHING IN THE WINTER MONTHS. FRINTON CRICKET CLUB RUNS TWO YOUTH COACHING GROUPS;JUNIOR, FOR UNDER FOURTEENS AND SENIOR, FOR UNDER SIXTEENS. PRACTICES ARE HELD THROUGHOUT THE SUMMER. MATCHES ARE PLAYED AGAINST OTHER YOUTH SIDES IN THE AREA. TOP SPOT IS A YOUTH CENTRE FOR TEENAGERS. IT PROVIDES A WIDE VARIETY OF LEISURE ACTIVITES, TAKEN BY YOUTH LEADERS AND VOLUNTEERS.
